title: Cribllake2Sentinel
descriptionMarkdown: This solution installs the CriblLake2Sentinel connector which is built using the Codeless Connector Platform and allows you to automatically ingest threat intelligence indicators from **CriblLake Orange Cyberdefense's CTI platform** into Microsoft Sentinel via the Upload Indicators REST API. After installing the solution, configure and enable this data connector by following guidance in Manage solution view.

sampleQueries.query: ThreatIntelligenceIndicator | where SourceSystem == 'CriblLake - OrangeCyberdefense'| sort by TimeGenerated desc

dataTypes.name: ThreatIntelligenceIndicator
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery: ThreatIntelligenceIndicator| where isnotempty(TimeGenerated) and SourceSystem == 'CriblLake - OrangeCyberdefense' | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)

value: ThreatIntelligenceIndicator| where SourceSystem == 'CriblLake - OrangeCyberdefense' | summarize LastLogReceived = max(TimeGenerated) | project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(30d)

resourceProvider.permissionsDisplayText: Read and write permissions are required.

instructionSteps.title: Installation and setup instructions
instructionSteps.description:
Use the documentation from this Github repository to install and configure the CriblLake to Microsoft Sentinel connector. 

https://github.com/cert-orangecyberdefense/CriblLake2sentinel
